bibl.title: In Defence of the Artemis of Antimachos.
bibl.note: Replies to: Paolo CARRARA, Sull'Artemide di Antimaco (fr. 75 Wyss), Prometheus 12 (1986) pp. 213-216. It must remain a real possibility (if not a probability) that the commentary P. Mil. Vogl. I, 17 (= Pack2 89) is on the poem called Artemis, ascribed to Antimachos.
MATTHEWS V., In Defence of the Artemis of Antimachos.
